unnormalised: Entertainment News: Music Streaming Wars Heat Up - Can Gaana Survive the Badshah of Competition?
normalised: Entertainment News: Music Streaming Wars Heat Up - Can G-a-a-n-a Survive the Badshah of Competition?

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26th – Is your data plan weeping silently in a corner? Blame music streaming! The battle for your ears and wallets is fiercer than a SRK dialogue in a Karan Johar movie.
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty sixth – Is your data plan weeping silently in a corner? Blame music streaming! The battle for your ears and wallets is fiercer than a S-R-K dialogue in a Karan Johar movie.

unnormalised: Reports indicate Gaana, once the undisputed 'Dilwale' of Indian music streaming, is facing some 'DDLJ' style romantic tension with global giants like Spotify and Apple Music, not to mention Amazon Music, who're showering users with more discounts than a Diwali Mela in Chandni Chowk.
normalised: Reports indicate G-a-a-n-a, once the undisputed 'Dilwale' of Indian music streaming, is facing some 'D-D-L-J' style romantic tension with global giants like Spotify and Apple Music, not to mention Amazon Music, who're showering users with more discounts than a Diwali Mela in Chandni Chowk.

unnormalised: Sources say IIT grads are working overtime to boost Gaana's algorithms, but can even cutting-edge tech beat the sheer marketing power of international conglomerates? One analyst quipped, "It's like trying to win a cricket match with a gully cricket team against the Indian national squad, even if they have a secret weapon of dhinchak Bollywood remixes."
normalised: Sources say I-I-T grads are working overtime to boost G-a-a-n-a's algorithms, but can even cutting-edge tech beat the sheer marketing power of international conglomerates? One analyst quipped, "It's like trying to win a cricket match with a gully cricket team against the Indian national squad, even if they have a secret weapon of dhinchak Bollywood remixes."

unnormalised: Experts predict further consolidation. Will Gaana be acquired, or will it find a way to keep grooving to its own beat? Stay tuned – this saga is definitely worth the price of your chai and samosas!
normalised: Experts predict further consolidation. Will G-a-a-n-a be acquired, or will it find a way to keep grooving to its own beat? Stay tuned – this saga is definitely worth the price of your chai and samosas!
